## Debug in 2s

This is particulary interesting for debugging dropdrown/popup, or any temporary HTML element you
struggle to have focus on.

```js
setTimeout(function () {
  debugger
}, 2000)
```

## prevent page to reload

```js
window.addEventListener(
  'beforeunload',
  () => {
    debugger
  },
  false
)
```

## debug all colors

https://github.com/bgrins/devtools-snippets/blob/master/snippets/allcolors/allcolors.js

## [A11y] - the 44x44 cursor

```js
;(function () {
  const style = document.createElement('style'),
    styleContent = document.createTextNode(`* {
      cursor: url(data:image/png;base64,) 22 22, auto !important
    }`)
  style.appendChild(styleContent)
  const caput = document.getElementsByTagName('head')
  caput[0].appendChild(style)
})()
```
